function.name: search
function.description: Perform Google web searches then returns a string of the top search results. Accepts multiple queries.

function.name: visit
function.description: Visit webpage(s) and return the summary of the content.

url.description: The URL(s) of the webpage(s) to visit. Can be a single URL or an array of URLs.

goal.description: The specific information goal for visiting webpage(s).
